description:
Kanami and Mihono review "Katana Maidens Quickening Arc" in 205 seconds so that you can fully enjoy watching Mini Toji more easily!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanami Mihono no "Toji Miko Taidou Hen" 205-byou de Shoukai Tokuban!
Mini Maidens, arc « Mouvement fœtal » − Présentation en 205 sec. !
Mini Toji with Kanami & Mihono "Katana Maidens Quickening Arc" 205-Second Introduction Special!
可奈美・美炎の「とじみこ 胎動編」205秒で紹介特番!
